text:
Hello everyone, here at SPRIGS we’re looking for a front-end developer with HubSpot experience.

Our in-house design team are well educated on how web development works and follow the web design principles to every detail, which means for the right candidate it will be a breeze to work with.
The job will consist mainly converting our designs to modular HubSpot Themes. That includes the HTML, SCSS, JS looks and functionality, and HubDB data manipulation.

The code needs to follow our code standards, to fit in with the boilerplate architecture we’ve build over the years.

Requirements and responsibilities:
- Experience with HTML, SCSS and JS
- Have two years of experience or more with HubL and HubSpot theme development
- Experience with git
- Develop clean, high-quality code that can be maintained over time
- Suggest and implement improvements on the codebase and documentation
- Analyze and raise concerns about the designs at an early stage of the projects
- Experience with webpack or other bundlers is a great addition.

The role requires great English communication skills.
The role is remote friendly and preferably close to the GMT+1 (Central European) timezone.

If you’re interested please DM me!
We are hiring not one but TWO HubSpot strategists as soon as possible! <https://www.remotish.agency/HubSpot-revops-agency/careers/HubSpot-strategist>
